availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Garrard Timberlake (Jefferson Co, KY, flour inspector)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, flour inspector. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Married to Isabella L. Morton Timberlake in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 23, 1849. Merchant in Bourbon County in 1850. Flour inspector in Louisville from 1858 to 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 268A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 9, p. 180B.
Find A Grave, "William Garrard Timberlake (1809-1885)," Memorial 88663681, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88663681 (accessed January 13, 2020).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707, p. 214 of microfilm.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007127, Louisville Deaths 1879-1887, Books 5-6, p. 559 of microfilm.
